title: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman’s investment pitch to US Inc: Financial inclusion, upskilling - The Indian Express
content:
1. Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman’s investment pitch to US Inc: Financial inclusion, upskilling  The Indian Express

description: Separately at the FATF ministerial meeting, Sitharaman reaffirmed India's political commitment to fight money laundering, terrorist financing and proliferation financing.
